title: S12 Ep154: The Hunt for the Devil Monkey
itunes:title: The Hunt for the Devil Monkey
description:
What do you get when you cross a kangaroo with a monkey? Evidently, a creature so evil, that it bashes down your door and steals your children for their next meal!! And, the worst part of this equation is, it exists on just about every country on Earth! Author/Investigator George Dudding joins Beyond The Darkness to explain why no one is safe from... the Devil Monkey!

George Dudding: http://www.gdparanormal.com/

https://www.amazon.com/Devil-Monkey-George-Dudding/dp/1542684560/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1503458909&sr=1-1&keywords=devil+monkey
